articles.author: Mark Thompson
articles.title: UBS is buying Credit Suisse in bid to halt banking crisis - CNN
articles.description: Switzerland's biggest bank, UBS, has agreed to buy its ailing rival Credit Suisse in an emergency rescue deal aimed at stemming financial market panic unleashed by the failure of two American banks earlier this month.
articles.content: Switzerlands biggest bank, UBS, has agreed to buy its ailing rival Credit Suisse in an emergency rescue deal aimed at stemming financial market panic unleashed by the failure of two American banks ea… [+5990 chars]

articles.title: Chris Rock, Drew Barrymore honor Adam Sandler at Mark Twain Prize - USA TODAY
articles.description: Chris Rock, Pete Davidson, Jennifer Aniston and more stars gathered to celebrate Adam Sandler being awarded the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor.
articles.content:
